All Kerala Quiz Competition
 FIRST PRIZE:RS.25000
 SECOND PRIZE:Rs.15000
 THIRD PRIZE:Rs.7500
 CERTIFICATES WILL BE AWARDED FOR ALL FINALISTS


As a part of Cynosue15 St.Joseph’s College of Engineering And Technology, Palai, All Kerala level Quiz competition CQ15 will be conducted. Momento certificate and Prizes worth Rs.50000 will be given to the winners.


RULES
 • Only team entries of 2 students are allowed
 • Only single team from each school will be eligible for the competition.
 • Teams should register before 25 August 2015 on www.cynosure15.com
 • Online prelims will be conducted for registered teams.


PRELIMS

• Online prelims will be conducted in the first week of September 2015.
 • Exact date of prelims will be informed to the registered teams.
 • Multiple teams from a school can register for the prelims.


FINALS
 Finals comprise of an elimination round and the GRAND FINALE.
 Elimination round will be held on 18 September 2015 at St.Joseph’s College of Engineering and Technology, Palai.

 GRAND FINALE
 Teams shortlisted from elimination round will Compete at the grand finale on !9 September 2015 at St.Joseph’s College of Engineering and Technology, Palai. Grand finale will be judged by an eminent quiz master
 • Finals will comprise of multiple rounds.
 • Decision of quiz master will be finals.


DETAILS OF ELIMINATION AND FINALE WILL BE INFORMED TO SHORT LISTED TEAMS AFTER ONLINE PRELIMS.
